portfolio.head: PT Super admin account let's you manage as many vendors as you need to!
portfolio.subhead: PT Customize and white label everything to your preferece with global settings. Use an iFrame for proof of concept and leverage our AP to lunch when you are ready.

testimonials.testimonial1: PORTUGESE The EZ4U SMS messaging platform supports the weekly communication needs of E. Leclerc stores in Portugal. The high message processing and delivery capacity has been, and continues to be, a preponderant reason for the selection of the EZ4U as our partner
testimonials.author1: PT Filipe Machado – CooplecNorte, E.Leclerc Portugal
testimonials.testimonial2: PT The recurring need of permanent contact with clients in the tourism sector has led, regarding SMS sending, to adopt and integrate EZ4U's solutions. We have already carried out, in an integrated way, several marketing campaigns and transactional trigger implementation, with critical time restrictions.
testimonials.author2: PT Fernando Morte - Information Systems – Viagens Abreu
testimonials.testimonial3: PT EZ4U is one of our reference partners, and its SMS solution is fully integrated in our Optical, Health and Social Economy Management solutions. This integration has had high levels of adoption by our customers, representing an added value to our global offer.
testimonials.author3: PT João Oliveira – Business Director – F3M
testimonials.testimonial4: PT The adoption of the EZ4U solutions in the scope of SMS communications has translated into an increase in operational efficiency in all Grupo Gocial companies. Activation and migration of EZ4U services was fast and in perfect coordination with our technical and Marketing teams.
testimonials.author4: PT Ricardo Gonçalves – Grupo Gocial Manager
